Texts.Eng: In the deep deserts, we have to be creative with our food. I need a few more samples before my new ^orange;Crawler Dunebun ^reset;recipe is ready... ^green;Could you go and capture a ^orange;Sandcrawler^reset;, then return the data to me? That'll help me finish the recipe!
Vas Vha'leih, my friend. You gave me exactly what I needed. Here's some Tokens of Merit for your trouble, and a copy of the recipe so you can make your own ^orange;Crawler Dunebuns^reset;!
